article_title: 10 Income Tax Breaks for the Rich and Famous
article_text:
Many federal income tax breaks are reserved for low-income families – the earned income tax credit (EITC) instantly comes to mind – but that doesn’t mean that wealthier individuals can’t get their fair share of the pie.

If you’re among the “rich and famous” in this country, you may still benefit from certain tax law provisions that don’t have any income thresholds or allow for plenty of leeway under generous limits. Here are ten top income tax breaks for upper-income earners.

article_summary:
Here are ten top income tax breaks for upper-income earners.
Many federal income tax breaks are reserved for low-income families – the earned income tax credit (EITC) instantly comes to mind – but that doesn’t mean that wealthier individuals can’t get their fair share of the pie.
If you’re among the “rich and famous” in this country, you may still benefit from certain tax law provisions that don’t have any income thresholds or allow for plenty of leeway under generous limits.
